body:
Hi Javed,


We do not calculate daylight factors currently. We believe that the DF is an antiquated metric and favor the "dynamic" and climate-based daylight metrics that are out there (and emerging). To add DF to the report would require an additional integration at each timestep for the overcast sky, which is required for the DF evaluation. So for now we elect to not calculate it. Sorry!




Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov






On 10/12/12 7:25 AM, "javed iqbal" <javedvit at gmail.com<mailto:javedvit at gmail.com>> wrote:


Hi,


This seems very nice. Is it possible to generate/visualize Daylight Factor in Result viewer?


Great work!


On Fri, Oct 12, 2012 at 3:18 AM, Guglielmetti, Robert <Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov<mailto:Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov>> wrote:
